ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that they would certainly be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that they shall certainly be succoured,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That undoubtedly, only they will be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That they verily would be made triumphant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely they shall be the assisted ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That they verily would be helped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that it is certainly they who will be helped;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That verily they! they shall be made triumphant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that they will indeed receive [Allah’s] help,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That they would certainly be assisted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That they verily would be made triumphant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that they shall receive Our help
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is they who will be supported.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:172] or it is His [following] saying — assuredly they shall be helped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: That they verily would be helped) with proof and reason,
